website_summaries.verdict: Simple in design, but a secure hands-free way to hold your phone without obstructing use of buttons or camera.
pros: Minimal design doesn't obstruct your view of camera or access to buttons
Adhesive metal button stays securely in place and allows you to rotate and pivot phone in any directions without removing from the lanyard
Comes in a wide range of colors
cons: Metal button is extremely difficult to remove should you change your mind

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product! Not just for phones!
